trait.name: Amorphous
text: The shadow beast can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
text: The shadow beast can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The shadow beast's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The beast has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, the shadow beast has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The shadow beast makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Shadow Push (Recharge 5-6)
text: The shadow beast buffets opponents with a gale of animated shadows in a 15-foot cone. Any creatures in the area of effect must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet and knocked prone.
